Text: Thanks man, these are great short stories from an incredibly talented writter !
Thanks! I love DFW. Where did you find this? I'd love to get digital versions of his other books.

I miss DFW. You can find more stuff of his on IRCC, it's really not very hard. Just go on Undernet and join a book warez channel, either #ebooks or @bookz.

If you like digital books, IRC is the place to look.
